metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10349 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The archive_le32dec function in archive_endian.h in libarchive 3.2.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4').
